actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to require each State having an approved medicaid plan to provide community mental health center services under such plan.

summary.text: Requires each State having an approved plan under Title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act to provide community mental health center services under such plan.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to require each State having an approved medicaid plan to provide community mental health center services under such plan.
